aks-cluster-config.Name: availability_zones
aks-cluster-config.Description: Region's availability zones to span the k8s cluster

aks-cluster-config.Name: disk_size
aks-cluster-config.Description: worker nodes disk size in GB

aks-cluster-config.Name: cluster_autoscaler_min_size
aks-cluster-config.Description: Minimum nodes count used for autoscaler in the range [1, 1000].

aks-cluster-config.Name: cluster_autoscaler_max_size
aks-cluster-config.Description: Maximum nodes count used for autoscaler in the range [1, 1000].

idsvr-config.Name: idsvr_admin_password
idsvr-config.Description: password for curity identity server admin console

idsvr-config.Name: idsvr_namespace
idsvr-config.Description: Name of the k8s namespace to deploy curity identity server

idsvr-config.Name: ingress_controller_namespace
idsvr-config.Description: Name of the k8s namespace to deploy NGINX Ingress Controller

idsvr-config.Name: logging_level
idsvr-config.Description: Logging Level for admin and runtime services

example-api-config.Name: api_namespace
example-api-config.Description: Name of the k8s namespace to deploy example api
